title: # 336 - Corinne Fisher & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Corinne Fisher from the "Guys we F****d" Podcast. We talk about being goth, Marilyn Manson, slut shaming, R Kelly, Amber Rose, and much more!

Check out her podcast "Guys we F****d" on iTunes and Spotify!

This episode is brought to you by Butcher Box. New subscribers will receive 2 LBS of FREE ground beef for life plus $20 off of your first box at www.Butcherbox.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.

This episode is also brought to you by Open Fit. Get a free 30 day trial and lose up to 15 pounds by texting “Bert” to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Capterra. Visit www.capterra.com/bert to find the right tool for your business 


Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on.. Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
